Articles.Content:
Hello fellow Kerbalnauts!

been playing KSP since 0.13 (landing gear? what landing gear?) but never really lurked the forums till i started playing around with mods. Currently in the process of replicating the ISS, but hopefully i can start making my own modular cap ships. cheers!

The ISS is always a fun project... I did mine in .16 or .17 ... forget wich one first had the docking ports.

I would say if you are going after big ships construction, a small (and by this I mean low part count) orbital station. Basically BIG fuel tanks and a couple of docking ports...

I only say this bescause once you get near the 300 parts count you will prolly hit flip book frame rates before you are ready to launch.

Alacrity Fitz

I like that station. That is a niice station.

Welcome to the forums!
Yeah I made an ISS replica to practice my rendezvous and docking procedures, a lot of patience and sweat D:
